bibl.title: Auxiliary θέλω.
bibl.note: 1. The grammaticalization of θέλω. - 2. A new assessment of the evidence before AD 600. - 3. A previously unobserved auxiliary function of θέλω. - 4. Conclusion. - Examples: θέλω as future auxiliary [Nos 1-42]; - θέλησον, θελήσατε = '(please) do'.
bibl.seg: Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 15-34.

1. The grammaticalization of θέλω. - 2. A new assessment of the evidence before AD 600. - 3. A previously unobserved auxiliary function of θέλω. - 4. Conclusion. - Examples: θέλω as future auxiliary [Nos 1-42]; - θέλησον, θελήσατε = '(please) do'.
